price: 49. Kani (Qur'aanku) waa waano (sharaf iyo darajo), waxayna leeyihiin kuwa iska jira (xumaha) meeqaan iyo meel noqod san.
arabic: هَٰذَا ذِكۡرٞۚ وَإِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ لَحُسۡنَ مَـَٔابٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: hādhā dhik'run wa-inna lil'muttaqīna laḥus'na maābin
